stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Merlin, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Merlin gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. Subroutine Do 2 net damage.
text: When the Runner encounters Merlin, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Merlin gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. [subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
title: Merlin
